explanation: [0-0] On an empty blue stage, a man in a red shirt and blue shorts stands with his legs apart and his left hand raised. In front of him is a large white ball. There are blue seats around him, and above him are steel frames and headlights.

[0-6] The man in red takes a big step forward, charges up his right hand, and throws something forcefully. Immediately, a row of white balloons in front of him explodes one after another, leaving behind puffs of white smoke where the balloons were. The deflated balloons lie on the ground. Then the scene cuts to a man with pink hair and glasses, wearing a green suit. He's standing in an empty room with beige checkered flooring, holding a pushpin and showing it to the camera. Behind him is a row of colorful balloons. He then turns around, lifts his right foot, charges up, and throws the pushpin. The first balloon pops. At this moment, a person in green appears from the left side of the screen and pops the remaining two balloons. Simultaneously, the man in the green suit turns back, points at the camera, and laughs. The scene then zooms in on him in a close-up, while the person in green bends down and walks out of the frame to the left.

[6-11] The scene then shifts to a pile of rocks, with the sun slightly above the horizon. A person in red clothing runs out from the left side of the screen, jumps up as they approach the middle of the screen, spins in the air, and lands on a motorcycle that appears from the left. The camera then follows as the person rides towards the right. The scene changes again to the pink-haired man, now wearing a yellow suit, standing in front of a building and pointing at the camera. At the same time, a person in green rides a bicycle from the left side of the screen. As the person in green reaches the middle, the pink-haired man jumps, spins, and lands on the bicycle's seat. Then, the person in green disappears from the scene, and the pink-haired man rides the bicycle out of the frame to the right.

[11-16] The scene then transforms to Michael Jackson, dressed in a white suit and hat, performing on stage and leaning forward. Beside him are backup dancers in black suits and hats, also leaning forward. The scene cuts back to the pink-haired man, now in a green suit, standing on dry, yellow grass and pointing at the camera. He then imitates Michael Jackson's forward lean. The person in green, behind him, squats down and grabs his ankle. Just as the pink-haired man is about to fall, he reaches out with his hand to support himself on the ground.
